titles.title: Don Young American Grown Act
Don Young American Grown Act
To require cut flowers and cut greens displayed in certain Federal buildings to be produced in the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, and in addition to the Committees on Foreign Affairs, and Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
